name: Trash Quest (FrancisVace)
description:
Spoiler Filled Map/Guide: https://imgur.com/a/1vRsuE2
You awaken on a strange space station with only one thought.
You must get your hands on their sweet stash of trash.
At any cost.
Controls:
Jump - A button / Z key
Shoot - Right Bumper / X key
Hover - X button / C key
Map - Y Button / M key
A game by Francis Vace
Music licensed from MoppySound
